hero.subline: Teaching Assistant & ITI Instructor | Programming Basics, Algorithms & Data Structures, C/C++, Flutter, Embedded Systems.

coach.name: Ahmed Khalil Alsayed
snapshot: Programming Basics and structured problem solving
Algorithms & Data Structures (C/C++) with practical exercises
Flutter fundamentals and applied mobile projects
Embedded Systems foundations and hands-on labs
achievements: ITI instruction experience (as stated in submitted profile)
Delivers beginner-to-intermediate tracks with practice-first approach
projects: Graduation project (details available upon request through Coach Academy)

items.q: What topics can this coach teach?
items.a: Programming Basics, Algorithms & Data Structures (especially in C/C++), introductory Flutter, and Embedded Systems fundamentals with hands-on practice.
Practice-first: guided labs, problem sets, and step-by-step feedback. Suitable for university students and adult learners.
Communication is available via the WhatsApp button on this page.

footer.blurb: Empowering talent through hands-on, outcome-driven technical coaching.
footer.contact_note: Contact details are intentionally hidden. Please use the WhatsApp button to communicate.
